value.description: The noble title of High Stellarch symbolizes the authority over vast stretches of land and holdings, and the stewardship of one of the greatest houses in the empire. Their allegiance is only to the emperor, and they are tasked with not only preserving but also expanding their influence and power throughout the realm. Only a select few are deemed worthy of such a title, and even fewer are willing to accept the heavy burden of responsibilities that come with it.

The noble title of Stellarch represents the governance of a sizable territory within the empire, with significant political and economic influence. They are responsible for the welfare of their people and the preservation of their lands, as well as for maintaining a strong military presence to protect against external threats. To be granted this title is a great honor, but it comes with great responsibility and the expectation of unwavering loyalty to the emperor.
